metadata.title: CVE-2023-26136 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Versions of the package tough-cookie before 4.1.3 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution due to improper handling of Cookies when using CookieJar in rejectPublicSuffixes=false mode. This issue arises from the manner in which the objects are initialized.

criterions.comment: node-tough-cookie package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
